verses.verse: ( Ascribe Glory to the LORD) מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> miz·mō·wr A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ of David. הָב֣וּ <WH3051> hā·ḇū Ascribe לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD, בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> bə·nê O heavenly beings אֵלִ֑ים <WH410> ’ê·lîm ..., ( Or sons of God or sons of might) הָב֥וּ <WH3051> hā·ḇū ascribe לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD כָּב֥וֹד <WH3519> kā·ḇō·wḏ glory וָעֹֽז׃ <WH5797> wā·‘ōz and strength.

הָב֣וּ <WH3051> hā·ḇū Ascribe לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> kə·ḇō·wḏ the glory שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> šə·mōw due His name; הִשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ <WH7812> hiš·ta·ḥă·wū worship לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD בְּהַדְרַת־ <WH1927> bə·haḏ·raṯ- in the splendor קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš of His holiness. ( Or in holy attire)

ק֥וֹל <WH6963> qō·wl The voice יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- is over הַ֫מָּ֥יִם <WH4325> ham·mā·yim the waters; אֵֽל־ <WH410> ’êl- the God הַכָּב֥וֹד <WH3519> hak·kā·ḇō·wḏ of glory הִרְעִ֑ים <WH7481> hir·‘îm thunders; יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- [is heard] over מַ֥יִם <WH4325> ma·yim waters. רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> rab·bîm many

קוֹל־ <WH6963> qō·wl- The voice יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD בַּכֹּ֑חַ <WH3581> bak·kō·aḥ [is] powerful; ק֥וֹל <WH6963> qō·wl the voice יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD בֶּהָדָֽר׃ <WH1926> be·hā·ḏār [is] majestic.

ק֣וֹל <WH6963> qō·wl The voice יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD שֹׁבֵ֣ר <WH7665> šō·ḇêr breaks אֲרָזִ֑ים <WH730> ’ă·rā·zîm the cedars; וַיְשַׁבֵּ֥ר <WH7665> way·šab·bêr shatters יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - אַרְזֵ֥י <WH730> ’ar·zê the cedars הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <WH3844> hal·lə·ḇā·nō·wn of Lebanon.

וַיַּרְקִידֵ֥ם <WH7540> way·yar·qî·ḏêm skip כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> kə·mōw- like עֵ֑גֶל <WH5695> ‘ê·ḡel a calf, לְבָנ֥וֹן <WH3844> lə·ḇā·nō·wn He makes Lebanon וְ֝שִׂרְיֹ֗ן <WH8303> wə·śir·yōn and Sirion ( That is, Mount Hermon) כְּמ֣וֹ <WH3644> kə·mōw like בֶן־ <WH1121> ḇen- a young רְאֵמִֽים׃ <WH7214> rə·’ê·mîm wild ox.
קוֹל־ <WH6963> qō·wl- The voice יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD חֹצֵ֗ב <WH2672> ḥō·ṣêḇ strikes לַהֲב֥וֹת <WH3852> la·hă·ḇō·wṯ with flames אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> ’êš of fire.

ק֣וֹל <WH6963> qō·wl The voice יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD יָחִ֣יל <WH2342> yā·ḥîl shakes מִדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> miḏ·bār the wilderness; יָחִ֥יל <WH2342> yā·ḥîl shakes יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> miḏ·bar the Wilderness קָדֵֽשׁ׃ <WH6946> qā·ḏêš of Kadesh.

ק֤וֹל <WH6963> qō·wl The voice יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD יְחוֹלֵ֣ל <WH2342> yə·ḥō·w·lêl twists אַיָּלוֹת֮ <WH355> ’ay·yā·lō·wṯ the oaks ( Or LORD makes the deer to calve) וַֽיֶּחֱשֹׂ֪ף <WH2834> way·ye·ḥĕ·śōp̄ bare. יְעָ֫ר֥וֹת <WH3293> yə·‘ā·rō·wṯ and strips the forests וּבְהֵיכָל֑וֹ <WH1964> ū·ḇə·hê·ḵā·lōw And in His temple כֻּ֝לּ֗וֹ <WH3605> kul·lōw all אֹמֵ֥ר <WH559> ’ō·mêr cry, כָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> kā·ḇō·wḏ “ Glory! ”

יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD לַמַּבּ֣וּל <WH3999> lam·mab·būl over the flood; יָשָׁ֑ב <WH3427> yā·šāḇ sits enthroned וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> way·yê·šeḇ is enthroned יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> me·leḵ as King לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> lə·‘ō·w·lām forever.

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD עֹ֭ז <WH5797> ‘ōz strength; לְעַמּ֣וֹ <WH5971> lə·‘am·mōw His people יִתֵּ֑ן <WH5414> yit·tên gives יְהוָ֓ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD יְבָרֵ֖ךְ <WH1288> yə·ḇā·rêḵ blesses אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עַמּ֣וֹ <WH5971> ‘am·mōw His people בַשָּׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> ḇaš·šā·lō·wm with peace.
